channel.title: Comments on: Scones – Daring Bakers Challenge January 2012

item.title: By: Food is our religion
item.dc:creator: Food is our religion
item.description: Those scones look so good! All you need now is a cup of tea and a plate of jam and cream! nom nom nom
item.content:encoded: Those scones look so good! All you need now is a cup of tea and a plate of jam and cream! nom nom nom

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: My favorite! I made some yesterday... Yours look perfect!
item.content:encoded:
My favorite! I made some yesterday…
Yours look perfect!

item.title: By: Carol Anne
item.dc:creator: Carol Anne
item.description: How great do they look on the cake plate? Really pretty and very tempting!
item.content:encoded: How great do they look on the cake plate? Really pretty and very tempting!

item.title: By: Daisy@Nevertoosweet
item.dc:creator: Daisy@Nevertoosweet
item.description: Lovely looking scones ~ so golden hehe perfect! I don't usually like cream but I have to have it with my scones :)
item.content:encoded: Lovely looking scones ~ so golden hehe perfect! I don’t usually like cream but I have to have it with my scones ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: What a gorgeous presentation! The jam and cream topping sounds amazing. It looks like you achieved the perfect texture for the scones.
item.content:encoded: What a gorgeous presentation! The jam and cream topping sounds amazing. It looks like you achieved the perfect texture for the scones.

item.title: By: thelittleloaf
item.dc:creator: thelittleloaf
item.description: Your scones look lovely - and there's absolutely nothing better than afternoon tea! I normally put the cream on first which I believe is the Devon way of doing it (the Cornish do jam first) :-)
item.content:encoded: Your scones look lovely – and there’s absolutely nothing better than afternoon tea! I normally put the cream on first which I believe is the Devon way of doing it (the Cornish do jam first) ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Kim
item.dc:creator: Kim
item.description: Sounds like you have been busy these last few months! Nice job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: Sounds like you have been busy these last few months! Nice job on the challenge!

item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: Your scones look lovely and puffy. So dainty on the cake stand too
item.content:encoded: Your scones look lovely and puffy. So dainty on the cake stand too

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: All ready for Devonshire tea then! The other day on 'Ready Steady Cook', one of the chefs mentioned a recipe for scones involving lemonade? I'm guessing that would be in place of the bicarb...? Have you ever tried anything like that?
item.content:encoded: All ready for Devonshire tea then! The other day on ‘Ready Steady Cook’, one of the chefs mentioned a recipe for scones involving lemonade? I’m guessing that would be in place of the bicarb…? Have you ever tried anything like that?

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: Beautiful scones! I love the heaps of jam and cream on your scones! The plateful is tempting!
item.content:encoded: Beautiful scones! I love the heaps of jam and cream on your scones! The plateful is tempting!
